title: I'd rather have the lag of NA than play on OCE rank system. Silver 3 into Gold 1's. Dead game.
body:
Solution: Have 4 queue's 
1. Normal
2. Rank solo/duo
3. 5's rank
4. bot game (who cares)

Screw it, I'm playing on NA. OCE is dead.

replies.body:
NA ping is crippling if you want to play anything needing reaction speed.  The games there are also just as trolly, maybe slightly more so due to autofills not caring about the small rank 'splash'.

Early season ranked tends to be awful wherever you are.  This season is messier with smurfs having to carve their way up from the bottom rather than the middle of the pack. 

Yes, so many games are being won by stomps, as we still have insane snowballing, and unlike in previous years, playing safe in lane means dominant laners get fed off plates anyway.

Silver 3 into gold 1 is now only 6 ranks different, certainly not uncommon for me in the last 2 years.  Doesn't occur in a typical game, but used to get 1-2 a week though s6-8.

There are problems, go to NA and they'll all be there waiting for you still, along with 180ms ping (ugh).

The game definitely feels worse than it did even just a couple of seasons ago. I've actually been toying with the idea of NA but haven't made an account there to check the ping yet, anyone know how bearable it is playing from NZ?
they just need to put in an incentive to play ranked whether its honor requirement or something like pay to play. I dunno something has to be done, norms is more competitive
If you live in Perth you could try playing on the best server, Korea. @NinetalesOCE only gets 120ms ping with a VPN
